.
test

<SelfClosingBlock attrs={1} />

test
.
p({},
  "test",
),
createElement(SelfClosingBlock, { attrs: 1 }),
p({},
  "test",
)
.


.
test

<h1>Hello, {firstName}!</h1>

test
.
p({},
  "test",
),
createElement(
  "h1",
  null,
  "Hello, ",
  firstName,
  "!"
),
p({},
  "test",
)
.


.
test

<SelfClosingBlock
  attrs={1}
  other={2}
/>

test
.
p({},
  "test",
),
createElement(SelfClosingBlock, {
  attrs: 1,
  other: 2
}),
p({},
  "test",
)
.


.
test

<Block>
tags **can** be closed in

a subsequent
</Block>

test
.
p({},
  "test",
),
createElement(
  Block,
  null,
  "tags **can** be closed in a subsequent"
),
p({},
  "test",
)
.


.
<Block>
  <Block>

</Block>
</Block>
.
createElement(
  Block,
  null,
  createElement(Block, null)
)
.


.
test

<Block
  pass='something'
>

</Block>

test
.
p({},
  "test",
),
createElement(Block, {
  pass: 'something'
}),
p({},
  "test",
)
.


.
test

<Block
</Block>

test
.
p({},
  "test",
),
p({},
  "<Block\n</Block>",
),
p({},
  "test",
)
.


.
<A>
  <B>
</A>
</B>
.
p({},
  "<A>\n  ",
  createElement(B, null,
    "\n</A>\n",
  ),
)
.


.
<A>
  <B>
</B>
.
p({},
  "<A>\n  ",
  createElement(B, null),
)
.
